ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in the management of:  Sales (Account Management).    ~~~~~~~~~~~~   has 10 years of work experience, with 5 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementStory:
Current position is a mid-level management role: Partner Manager
Starting on 8/1/2020, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 6 months:
	Title: Partner Manager for Stars
Starting on 10/1/2017, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years and 10 months:
	Title: Account Manager
Starting on 1/1/2015, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years:
	Title: Account Executive

Positions.Description:
Ireland

•	Identifies/evaluates brands, companies and sponsors for future partnership and make recommendations.
•	Builds and maintains positive relationships with "Stars" and Partners.
•	Keep and maintain information and knowledge on the Partners.
•	Help the app to become the ultimate platform for Stars to find trust, quality products and services.

Ireland

•	Identifying customer needs and offering the appropriate products and services.
•	Selling the whole range of National Pen Promotional products.
•	Meeting and exceeding weekly sales targets.

PERFORMANCE:
•  Weekly sales target exceeded - Average of 4.600,00€ revenue on a weekly basis.
•  18.740,00€ revenue generated in one week
•  262.000€ revenue created in one year

Ireland

•	Act as an influencer and trusted advisor to help people become knowledgeable with the Cloud.
•	Be the first contact point of many customers, deliver a strong first impression and set foundation for long term customer
relationship.
•	Meet and exceed daily, weekly, monthly and quarterly targets, including pipeline generation and activity based target,
accurately forecast pipeline generation.
•	Work in a fast-paced, collaborative and dynamic teaming environment with Inside Opportunity Executives, Technical
solution Professionals and Consumption Analysts to effectively manage opportunities and pipeline through the sales cycle.

PERFORMANCE:
•  Generating pipeline: 645K€ created and 120k € closed
•  Weekly metrics reached
•  Driving Cloud consumption/adoption with cross-products (Office 365, Dynamics, Power BI)

Ireland

•	Driving the full sales cycle to attain new business: make introductory calls, assess business goals through qualifying, work
with business owners in Yelp's platform and advertising packages and close the deals.
•	Analyse the business needs.
•	Calculating the best package to sell for best ROI and retention.
•	Achieving and exceeding monthly sales target.

PERFORMANCE:
•  Monthly sales target exceeded - Average of 7.500,00€ revenue out of 5.000,00€ target expectation
•  15.250,00€ revenue generated in one month
•  Sales pitches exceeded - Over 20 sales pitches each month out of 20 sales pitches expectation

•   Handling pre-certification requests of health care providers in France and other European countries.
•   Explaining the terms of the contracts to the providers and the insured.
•   Insuring the cooperation of different parties involved: the insured, assistant companies, commercial team, medical advisors.

United States

•   Assisted the Store Manager with daily and weekly sales reports.

PERFORMANCE:

Findings.Message: You should not use the PDF format for your resume. Due to inherent limitations with text extraction from PDFs, you are less likely to get a job when using a PDF resume.
Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
Multiple phone numbers were found in the contact information. Only one phone number ( a mobile number) should be included in a resume.
